alert.note: Alert for Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 24 at 8:31PM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH FOR BLIZZARD CONDITIONS REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on sharply reduced visibility and difficult if not treacherous driving conditions. Road closures will be possible.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Persons should consider delaying travel on Tuesday. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.
